about_the_game:
Step aside, Ninja Turtles, it's time for the Ultra Mega Cats to hit the big stage!

Ultra Mega Cats is a fast-paced roguelike cooperative third-person shooter. In it, you control one of the Mega Cats, armed to the fangs with the goal of escaping corporate captivity while battling hordes of enemies. Fight through a series of randomly selected rooms and perform feats of dexterity and skill in an extremely dynamic environment – solo or with friends.

Go rogue and awaken your purr instincts

Imagine living in a world flipped upside down, where rodents and feathered forces rule and cats are shunned. You're one of the last cats standing – disgraced, brainwashed, and trained to serve your former prey as their personal killing machine. But that is not enough, as the cat’s soul knows no master! Awaken your inner predator and restore balance to this world!

Put your foes in their place

While your rage-fuelled instinct and millenia of evolutionary experience may make you think that pouncing with claws and fangs at your enemies will get the job done, well, things have changed drastically, and your enemies have caught on. You’ll need to make good use of your skills, especially against the likes of bomb-carrying hamsters.

Utilize a wide range of abilities and playstyles to survive the onslaught of enemies in your way.

Who runs the world? Cats!

As you move throughout the world with cat-like agility, you’re able to tailor your experience to your liking. Choose your favorite Mega Cat, personalize your loadout, and discover thousands of build possibilities, allowing you to play however you want.

Features:

  • At your disposal: Choose from five different ultra cats (two at Early Access launch) with different play styles and personalities. Each cat has 50 different M.O.D.S that can be unlocked, offering more variety.
  • Friends fur-ever: Streamlined, arena-based co-op PvE combat for up to two players in Early Access and up to 4 players co-op planned at full release.
  • Gods of the Arena: Each arena is arranged into ever-changing biomes through level generation. Thanks to different Coalitions (each consisting of different Aspects), no two playthroughs are the same.
  • It’s purrdy: The game’s stunning, vibrant art style packs as much of a punch as your cat hero will, ka-pow!
  • Who wants to live in a world ruled by mice anyway?: Work together to free the three Ancient Cats from their enslavement, defeat your rodent and bird enemies and create a new cattopia for felines everywhere.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable GPU, with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 capable GPU, Nvidia or AMD, with at least 8 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Blast your way through hordes of enemies in Ultra Mega Cats, a cooperative roguelike third-person shooter. Play As one of the Mega Cats, armed to the fangs with a wide variety of abilities and escape captivity from your Rodent and Bird Overlords!
